verses.roman:
ei mata kahiluṅ eka ślokera vyākhyāna
vātulera pralāpa kari' ke kare pramāṇa?

synonyms: ei mata—in this way; kahiluṅ—I have spoken; eka—one; ślokera—of a verse; vyākhyāna—the explanation; vātulera pralāpa—the talking of a madman; kari'-doing; ke kare pramāṇa—who will accept this as evidential proof.
translation: "In this way, like a madman, I have explained the meaning of just one verse. I do not know who will take this as evidence.
